item.title: New Search Service
item.description: https://pagedart.com/ - AI search as a service the free tier includes 1000 Documents, 50000 searches. Larger free tiers are possible for worthwhile projects.

item.title: note on hosting
item.description: https://forestry.io/ - Headless CMS. Give your editors the power of Git. Create and edit Markdown-based content with ease. Comes with three free sites that includes 3 editors, Instant Previews. Integrates with blogs hosted on Netlify/GitHubpages/ elsewhere

item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://scrapingdog.com/ - Scrapingdog handles millions of proxies, browsers and CAPTCHAs to provide you with HTML of any web page in a single API call. It also provides Web Scraper for Chrome & Firefox and a software for instant scraping demand.

item.title: Update README.md
item.description:
https://www.scraperapi.com/ - — Cloud based web scraping API handles proxies, browsers, and CAPTCHAs. Scrape any web page with a simple API call. Get started with 1000 free API calls/month.
https://scrapingdog.com/ - Scrapingdog handles millions of proxies, browsers and CAPTCHAs to provide you with HTML of any web page in a single API call. It also provides Web Scraper for Chrome & Firefox and a software for instant scraping demands.

item.title: Add "Google Fonts" in the "Font" section
item.description: https://fonts.google.com/ - - Lots of free fonts that are easy and quick to install in a website via a download or a link to Google's CDN.
